Address.label: Address
Address.value: 625 HOWE STREET,SUITE 1500, VANCOUVER, British Columbia, V6C 2T6, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Pan American Silver Corp is a mining company focused exclusively on the exploration and development of silver mines. It produced roughly 22 million ounces of silver in 2011. The company operates primarily in Central and South America. It also sells the byproducts from its silver mining operations, including zinc, lead, copper, and gold. Pan American Silver is based in British Columbia.
